Interface functions

  • All Superinterfaces:

extends java.util.Collection<function>

      • initFromFile

           throws java.io.IOException

        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • drawFunctions

        void drawFunctions(int width,
                   int height,
                   Range rx,
                   Range ry,
                   int resolution)
        Draws all the functions in the collection in a GUI window using the given parameters for the GUI windo and the range & resolution
        Parameters:
        width - - the width of the window - in pixels
        height - - the height of the window - in pixels
        rx - - the range of the horizontal axis
        ry - - the range of the vertical axis
        resolution - - the number of samples with in rx: the X_step = rx/resulution

      • drawFunctions

        void drawFunctions(java.lang.String json_file)
        Draws all the functions in the collection in a GUI window using the given JSON file
        Parameters:
        json_file - - the file with all the parameters for the GUI window. Note: is the file id not readable or in wrong format should use default values.
